title: Public WiFi is safe and 4 other tech fears you can stop worrying about
description: Don’t waste your energy on these minimal, overhyped privacy and security risks.

title: What to know about Bluesky, as Dril and AOC join the new Twitter alternative
description: The Jack Dorsey-backed app could be Twitter's doppleganger, but it aims to create a social network where no single person or algorithm reigns.
